mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM video a, member b WHERE a.member_seq = b.member_seq

SELECT a.*, b.member_nick as channelName FROM video a, member b WHERE a.member_seq = b.member_seq AND publish_yn = 1 AND delete_yn = 'N'
AND a.title like CONCAT('%',#{defaultVO.searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY video_seq desc
SELECT a.*, b.member_nick as channelName FROM video a, member b WHERE a.member_seq = b.member_seq ORDER BY video_seq desc LIMIT #{defaultVO.pageSize} OFFSET #{defaultVO.offset}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video (video, video_thumnail,title,content, member_seq) VALUES (#{video.video}, #{video.videoThumnail}, #{video.title}, #{video.content}, #{video.memberSeq})
